name: Wii U Mii
summary: An FFSD file is a Mii used in a Nintendo Wii U video game. It contains an animated character that is shown in-game. Both official and player-created Wii U Miis are saved as FFSD files.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.

windows.display_name: Not meant to be opened outside the Nintendo Wii U games in which they are used
